msg: Hello @{user}, I'm a bot that can help you with collecting stats
from Faceit servers. For help type /help, to assign a username type /login

login-start-already.msg: You are already logged in. Are you sure you want to change your username?

msg: Please enter your Faceit username as a link https://www.faceit.com/**/players/****/ or {username}
We are checking your Faceit username...
This is not a valid Faceit profile link!
Something went wrong. The profile name is incorrect.
Ok, your username is {user}. Is it correct?

Perfect, your data ‚Üì 
‚ñ∂ Faceit ID: {fid}
‚ñ∂ Username: {fn}
Try to get statistics for your last match using /lastmatch More commands can be found with /help

Here is a list of commands that I can handle:

/login - Assign a username
/start - show start panel

>>> STATS COMMANDS
/info [your request] - show stats of player that includes in request; if request is none, show all stats
/compare [your request] - compare more than one player and show result
/bestmatch [your request] - show best match of player
This is a preliminary list!
